sentence.Network_en: Six weeks after conception your baby is the size of your little fingernail.
sentence.Network_cn: 怀孕6个星期后，胎儿的大小相当于小拇指的指甲。

sentence.Network_en: Melanie gnawed a long, painted fingernail.
sentence.Network_cn: 梅拉妮咬着涂过指甲油的长指甲。

entry.def: Your fingernails are the thin hard areas at the end of each of your fingers.

means.word_mean: 1. the nail at the end of a finger

She dug her fingernails into my neck.
